resources.string: Please Enter the Otp below we sent on
A new version of Wadhu-War is available. Please update to version\s
Adding details to your profile lets you control and enhance how others see your profile
Steps to edit profile details on Wadhuwar App:
1. Click on the My Profile tab available at second-bottom corner of the Main screen.
2. Then Click on Edit option available next to your Profile ID.
3. You get an option to edit your profile details category-wise (Basic info, About Myself section, Religious background, etc.)
Please note that critical details like Religion, Community, Date of Birth, Gender, Height, Martials status and Mother tongue can be changed only once after profile registration.
To edit your profile, click on the button below:
Upgrade to any of our Membership Plans and we guarantee you will find a match!
